verbose_text: In the meantime, anti-PD-1 and anti-CTLA-4 therapy further enhanced the T-cell activation and the depletion of Tregs by inhibiting the immunosuppressive tumor microenvironment.
evidence: anti-PD-1 and anti-CTLA-4 therapy further enhanced the T-cell activation and the depletion of Tregs by inhibiting the immunosuppressive tumor microenvironment
